	}

			NOT = {

country_event = { 
	id = Privilege.5
	title = Privilege_BUHierarchy_t
	desc = Privilege_BUHierarchy_d
	picture = ECONOMY_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Privilege_Change
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = Privilege_BUHierarchyRaise_title
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_BUHierarchy2Has
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = nol
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_BUHierarchy0Has
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = nol
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_AllOf
			custom_tooltip = POP_BUHasInfluence_30
			custom_tooltip = POP_BUHasPow_25
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Privilege_BUHierarchy1Raise_description
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									ai = yes
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_L
								}
							}
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_BU
								influence = 30
							}
							AND = { 
								ai = yes
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_BU
									influence = 10
								}
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ati
										value = 10
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									NOT = { 
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
									}
									NOT = { 
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S

	id = Privilege.6
	title = Privilege_BUHire_t
	desc = Privilege_BUHire_d
	picture = ECONOMY_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Privilege_Change
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = Privilege_BUHireRaise_title
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_BUHire4Has
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = nom
							value = 4
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_BUHire0Has
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = nom
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_AllOf
			custom_tooltip = POP_BUHasInfluence_30
			custom_tooltip = POP_BUHasPow_20
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Privilege_BUHire1Raise_description
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								OR = { 
									ai = yes
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_S
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_M
									has_country_modifier = BU_Advisor_L
								}
							}
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_BU
								influence = 30
							}
							AND = { 
								ai = yes
								faction_influence = { 
									faction = FC_BU
									influence = 10
								}
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ati
										value = 10
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									NOT = { 
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BG_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_CL_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_TR_Boost_L
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_M
										has_country_modifier = FC_BU_Boost_L
									}
									NOT = { 
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_S
										has_country_modifier = FC_NO_Crackdown_M

		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Privilege_Change
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = Privilege_BUOversightRaise_title
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_BUOversight2Has

						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = noo
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = {

											check_variable = { 
												which = bdu
												value = -100
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdu
									value = -100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = bdu
											value = 100.001
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdu
									value = 100
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 0.001
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 1000
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_tooltip = BU_RelationState_10
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = Privilege_UI_Info
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					ai = yes
				}
				set_country_flag = Nat_Update
			}
			else = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = POP_Census.994
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = PTM_EXIT
	}
	after = { 
		clr_country_flag = Privilege_Change
		remove_country_modifier = Prov_PrivilegeUIBlock
	}
}

							}
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = Elite_RelationState_30
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							always = yes
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = bdu
								value = 10
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = {

									}

country_event = { 
	id = Privilege.11
	title = Privilege_BUCourts_t
	desc = Privilege_BUCourts_d
	picture = ECONOMY_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Privilege_Change
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = Privilege_BUCourtsRaise_title
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_BUCourts3Has
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = nor
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_BUCourts0Has
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = nor
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_AllOf
			custom_tooltip = POP_BUHasInfluence_20
			custom_tooltip = POP_BUHasPow_15
			custom_tooltip = Reqs_HasAverageAutonomy80
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_NoneOf

country_event = { 
	id = Privilege.12
	title = Privilege_BUPolitics_t
	desc = Privilege_BUPolitics_d
	picture = ECONOMY_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Privilege_Change
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = Privilege_BUPoliticsRaise_title
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_BUPolitics3Has
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = not
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_BUPolitics0Has
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = not
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
			}

			custom_tooltip = POP_BUHasInfluence_30_Pactless

			custom_tooltip = POP_HasExecAuth_50
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Privilege_BUPolitics1Raise_description
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_BU
								influence = 30
							}

								ai = yes

									faction = FC_BU
									influence = 10
								}

									}
								}
							}

								which = bdq
								value = -100

							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = {

										value = 100.001
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {

							which = bdq
							value = 0.001
						}

							value = 1000
						}

							which = ach
							value = 2
						}

					}

			}
			else = { 
				tooltip = { 
					hidden_effect = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = khz
							value = 1
						}
					}
					add_adm_power = -25
					add_dip_power = -25
					add_mil_power = -50
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = asn
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = asq
								value = -35
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = asr
								value = -35
							}

									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = asq
											value = 100.001
										}
									}
								}

												value = 0
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = asq
									value = 0
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
						}
					}

					if = { 
						limit = { 
							always = yes
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = -30
							}

								limit = { 
									NOT = {

												value = -100
											}
										}
									}
								}

							}
							else_if = {

											value = 100.001
										}
									}
								}

									which = bdq
									value = 100
								}

								which = bdq

							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = 1000
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}

						}
					}

							change_variable = { 
								which = ach
								value = 2
							}
							set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = POP_WelfareProv_2
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = Privilege_UI_Info
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					ai = yes
				}
				set_country_flag = Nat_Update
			}
			else = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = POP_Census.994
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = PTM_EXIT
	}
	after = { 
		clr_country_flag = Privilege_Change
		remove_country_modifier = Prov_PrivilegeUIBlock
	}

								which = bdq
								value = -40
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = bdq
												value = -100
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdq
									value = -100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = bdq
											value = 100.001
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdq
									value = 100
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = 0.001
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = 1000
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_tooltip = NO_RelationState_-40
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = ach
								value = 4
							}
							set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = POP_WelfareProv_4
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = Privilege_UI_Info
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					ai = yes
				}
				set_country_flag = Nat_Update
			}
			else = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = POP_Census.994
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = PTM_EXIT
	}
	after = { 
		clr_country_flag = Privilege_Change
		remove_country_modifier = Prov_PrivilegeUIBlock
	}
}

									check_variable = {

										value = 100.001
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = 100
							}
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = bdq
							value = 0.001
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = bdq
							value = 1000
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							always = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = NO_RelationState_30
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				tooltip = { 
					hidden_effect = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = kie
							value = 1
						}
					}
					add_mil_power = -50
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = asn
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = asq
								value = 20
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = asr
								value = 20
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = asq
											value = 100.001
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {

									value = 100

						custom_tooltip = NO_RelationState_-35
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				tooltip = { 
					hidden_effect = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = kif
							value = 1
						}
					}
					add_adm_power = -25
					add_dip_power = -25
					add_mil_power = -50
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = asn
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = asq
								value = -40
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = asr
								value = -40
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = asq
											value = 100.001
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = asq
									value = 100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = asq
												value = 0
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = asq
									value = 0
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = POP_NOLoyProv_-40
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							always = yes
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = -35
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = bdq
												value = -100
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdq
									value = -100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = bdq
											value = 100.001
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdq
									value = 100
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = 0.001
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = 1000
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_tooltip = NO_RelationState_-35
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = Privilege_UI_Info
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					ai = yes
				}
				set_country_flag = Nat_Update
			}
			else = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = POP_Census.994
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = PTM_EXIT
	}
	after = { 
		clr_country_flag = Privilege_Change
		remove_country_modifier = Prov_PrivilegeUIBlock
	}
}

									check_variable = { 
										which = ati
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = atm
								value = 10
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = atn
								value = 10
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = atm
											value = 100.001
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = atm
									value = 100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = atm
												value = 0
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = atm
									value = 0
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = POP_BULoyProv_10
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				custom_trigger_tooltip = { 
					tooltip = Privilege_NOHierarchy3Has
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = kig
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = Rights_UI_NoneOf
			custom_tooltip = POP_NONotHasInfluence_65
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			custom_tooltip = Privilege_NOHierarchy2Lower_description
			custom_tooltip = Rights_LB
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						adm_power = 25
						dip_power = 25
						mil_power = 50
						NOT = { 
							faction_influence = { 
								faction = FC_NO
								influence = 65
							}
						}
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = kig
						value = 2
					}
				}
				add_adm_power = -25
				add_dip_power = -25
				add_mil_power = -50
				hidden_effect = { 
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = asn
									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = asq
							value = -50
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = asr
							value = -50
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = asq
										value = 100.001
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = asq
								value = 100
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = asq
											value = 0
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = asq
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
					}
				}
				custom_tooltip = POP_NOLoyProv_-50
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						always = yes
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = bdq
							value = -50
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = bdq
											value = -100
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = -100
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = bdq
										value = 100.001
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = 100
							}
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = bdq
							value = 0.001
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = bdq
							value = 1000
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							always = yes
						}
						custom_tooltip = NO_RelationState_-50
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ati
									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = atm
							value = 10
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = atn
							value = 10
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = atm
										value = 100.001
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = atm
								value = 100
							}
						}
						else_if = {

								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = atm
											value = 0
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = atm
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_province_flag = Unrest_Update

				}

			}

							which = kig

						}
					}

									}

									NOT = {

												value = 0
											}

									}

								set_variable = {

									value = 0
								}

							}

						}

							limit = {

										value = 0.001
									}

							}
							change_variable = {

								}

				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = Privilege_UI_Info
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					ai = yes
				}
				set_country_flag = Nat_Update
			}
			else = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = POP_Census.994
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = PTM_EXIT
	}
	after = { 
		clr_country_flag = Privilege_Change
		remove_country_modifier = Prov_PrivilegeUIBlock
	}

					if = { 
						limit = { 
							always = yes
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = -35
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = bdq
												value = -100
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdq
									value = -100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = bdq
											value = 100.001
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = bdq
									value = 100
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = 0.001
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = bdq
								value = 1000
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								always = yes
							}
							custom_tooltip = NO_RelationState_-35
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = { 
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ati
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = atm
								value = 10
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = atn
								value = 10
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = atm
											value = 100.001
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = atm
									value = 100
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = atm
												value = 0
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = atm
									value = 0
								}
							}
							set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
						}
					}
					custom_tooltip = POP_BULoyProv_10
				}
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = Privilege_UI_Info
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					ai = yes
				}
				set_country_flag = Nat_Update
			}
			else = { 
				hidden_effect = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = POP_Census.994
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = PTM_EXIT
	}
	after = { 
		clr_country_flag = Privilege_Change
		remove_country_modifier = Prov_PrivilegeUIBlock
	}
}

					country_event = { 
						id = POP_Census.994
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = PTM_EXIT
	}
	after = { 
		clr_country_flag = Privilege_Change
		remove_country_modifier = Prov_PrivilegeUIBlock
	}
}
